trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 提供对已安装的语音合成引擎功能的访问。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的 SpeechSynthesizer 对象时，它将使用默认系统语音。

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要配置为使用其中一个已安装的语音合成 （文本到语音转换） 语音 SpeechSynthesizer，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关哪些安装语音的信息，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>类。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供了控制语音合成的以下方面:-若要将配置 SpeechSynthesizer 对象的输出，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要生成语音，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 可以生成文本，从语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>对象，或从[语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -若要暂停和继续语音合成，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -若要添加或删除词典，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 可以使用一个或多个词典指导其语法的单词的发音。

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -若要修改语音输出的传递，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 引发事件时遇到提示中的某些功能: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>)。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: 它还会引发报告启动的事件 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) 和结束 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) 的操作进行通信和讲话声音的更改上 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>)。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>在发布到 SpeechSynthesizer 最后一个引用之前。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源不会被释放之前垃圾回收器调用 SpeechSynthesizer 对象的<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 当您初始化一个新<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>实例，它使用默认系统语音。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要配置<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>若要使用已安装的语音合成 （文本到语音转换） 语音之一，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关哪些安装语音的信息，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>类。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到词典<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 发音词典是词或短语以及其发音，字母和受支持的拼音字母中的字符组成的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: 词典可用于在你的应用程序中指定的专用词汇的自定义发音。

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 外部词典文件中指定的发音优先于语音合成器的内部词典或字典的发音。

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 但是，发音中的内联指定提示创建与中的任意<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>方法将优先于任何词典中指定的发音。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: 内联发音仅适用于 word 的单一匹配项。

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[词典和拼音字母表](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加多个词典到<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象。当前支持两个值`mediaType`参数:-值`application/pls+xml`指示词典符合[发音词典规范 (PLS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766)。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: 这是要使用的首选的格式。

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -值`application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex`指示词典格式为未压缩的词典，是一种 Microsoft 专有格式。

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: 这是旧格式，我们建议你使用前面所述的 PLS 格式。

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: 词典信息的位置。

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 词典的媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 媒体类型值不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 时引发<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>遇到一条提示中的书签。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>处理任一时引发此事件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的数据有关的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加使用书签<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 释放<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>在会话期间使用的对象并释放资源。

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: 充当一种安全措施来清理资源的事件中<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>不调用方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: 获取提示<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>语速。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前所说的提示对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已安装的语音合成 （文本到语音转换） 的声音。

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 一种声音是为系统安装的语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 的引擎。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前安装在系统上的语音的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已安装的语音合成 （文本到语音转换） 语音支持特定的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的区域设置中的已安装的语音支持，此方法将返回空集合。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行文本到语音转换使用的区域性属性中指定的语言，必须安装语音合成引擎支持该语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: 语音合成引擎附带的以下语言-国家/地区代码的 Microsoft Windows 7 工作:-EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: 英语 （美国）-ZH-CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中国）-ZH-TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 此外允许例如"en"中文 （台湾） 两个字母语言代码。

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: 语音必须支持的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前安装在系统上的语音支持指定的区域设置的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 暂停<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: 当达到音素时引发。

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: 音素是书面语言的一个基本组件，通常表示一个或多个非重复声音字母 （或两个字母的组合） 的字母。

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字母"c"是听起来可能很像"cinder"中的"s"或"k"中"catch"音素。

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: 编写的字是以音素。

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: 单词中更改音素将改变它的拼写。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>实例生成每个部分构成音素 word PhonemeReached 事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: 例如，单词"主题"会生成三个 PhonemeReached 事件;分别为"th"声音、"e"声音和"m"声音 （我）。

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，以及有关与事件关联的数据的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的语速<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: 返回的语速<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象，范围为-10 到 10。

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除从词典<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>以举例。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: 词典文档的位置。

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 恢复<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象后已暂停。

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: 按名称选择特定的语音。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>类来获取名称的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择一种声音，传递的全部内容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>为 SelectVoice 方法自变量的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象选择包含的第一个已安装的语音`name`中的语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>执行区分大小写，子字符串比较来确定是否匹配语音`name`。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序调用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>，该方法验证是否在注册表中查找的语音的每个符合特定最小的条件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 对于未通过验证，任何声音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>设置其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>属性`False`。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不能选择一种声音其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>属性是`False`。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置某个声音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择按性别、 年龄或区域设置的声音，请使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引发 SpeakCompleted 事件在任一种情况完成<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>类不具有任何属性，并且不从 SpeakCompleted 事件返回数据。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: 它被用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序 SpeakCompleted 事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 之后引发<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>说出一个提示每个单个单词。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引发此事件在提示符下使用的任何脚本使用每个新 word <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引发此事件开始处理使用任一的提示时<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>类不具有任何属性，并且不从 SpeakStarted 事件返回数据。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: 它被用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序 SpeakStarted 事件。

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要暂停和继续语音合成，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: 当达到 viseme 时引发。

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Viseme 时读出音素嘴和字体的基本位置。

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes 是直观表示形式音素。

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech 支持美国英语，其中每个对应于一个或多个音素 21 visemes。

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: 当达到新音素具有比以前音素达到不同相应 viseme 时，会引发 VisemeReached 事件。

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: 由于某些 visemes 表示多个音素，将不会生成 VisemeReached 事件，如果下一个音素达到对应于相同 viseme 为以前的音素。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于说"此区域"<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>中"this"的"s"和"区域"中的"z"引发事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: 但是，VisemeReached 将不引发事件的"区域"中的"z"因为它对应于相同 viseme 作为"this"中的"s"。

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: 下面是 21 SAPI 音素和对应于在美国英语 viseme 的音素组的列表。

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: |Viseme |Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | 静默 | |&1; | 遍历，ax，ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | 框里，eh，哎呀 | |&5; | er | |&6; | y、 iy、 ih、 ix | |&7; | w，uw | |&8; |ow | |&9; | 原始 | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s、 z | |&16; | sh，ch、 jh、 中文 | |&17; | th、 dh | |&18; | f、 v | |&19; | d、 t 和 n | |&20; | k、 g 和 ng | |&21; | p、 b、 m | 有关与关联的数据信息`VisemeReached`事件，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关当前语音的信息<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 当您初始化一个新<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>，它使用默认系统语音。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要配置<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象要使用已安装的语音合成语音之一，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关哪些安装语音的信息，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>类。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关当前语音的信息<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 时引发的声音<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>更改。

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，以及有关与事件关联的数据的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改所选声音，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>使用与中的任意<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置输出量<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: 返回的卷<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>，从 0 到 100 之间。
